intro: Hesperaster densus, commonly known as the dense starwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the Apiaceae family. It is characterized by its dense, clustered inflorescence and finely divided leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Its flowers are small and white, often arranged in complex umbels. Hesperaster densus is notable for its aromatic properties and is sometimes used in traditional herbal medicine.
